text: Alan S. Rau is an American lawyer, currently the Mark G. and Judy G. Yudof Chair in Law at University of Texas School of Law, and also previously a Distinguished Professor at Queen Mary University of London and the Fred Paulus Chair in Public Policy and at Williamette University College. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of Texas at Austin faculty Category:American lawyers Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Harvard Law School alumni
title: Alan S. Rau
